评论概述: As pictured, fit well, true to size.
评论详情: The pants are cute! Slightly high waisted (around belly button) and perfect amount of baggy— not too baggy, still form fitting and comfortable if bloated. 5’6 and 135-145 lbs (depends on how bloated i am lol) The material is light, like a very light windbreaker. Not necessarily see through though. It’s VERY light material, kinda thin, but it’s comfortable and Kept me warm enough in 50ish degrees evening time. Idk if the pants are worth $30 but I’m happy with my purchase. Most clothes are a little overpriced anyways. $20-25 would be a fair price IMO. if you’re looking for a thicker windbreaker material then may not be for you. the stretch is decent! and you can adjust it with the little strings in the waist area and leg area. OVERALL would recommend if you’re looking for a light windbreaker material pants. I bought specifically for a festival for me to feel confident even when bloated, and they’re cute and comfortable.

I’ve been meaning to buy another pair. I bought the blue in xl. It’s actually fits pretty well but if you want it more baggy I’d suggest going a size up. It’s hits perfectly on the waste. Very comfortable. The material is very lightweight.

评论概述: 5 Stars - Comfortable and Stylish Y2K Vibe!!
评论详情: I love these DISCIPBUSH Y2K Cargo Pants! The baggy, parachute style is exactly what I was looking for, giving off that trendy, relaxed Y2K vibe. They are super comfortable, and the adjustable waistband ensures a great fit every time.  The material is lightweight but durable, making them perfect for casual outings or just lounging around. The multiple pockets are both functional and add to the stylish look. These pants are versatile and can easily be paired with different tops for a cool, laid-back outfit.  If you’re into the Y2K aesthetic and want something stylish and comfy, I highly recommend these cargo pants!

Bought for my daughter. She is a size 0 and is 5’4.5”weighing in at 112lbs. The sizing fit true to size. IMO was no see through.  Bought it for a black light party! So white was perfect! She said they are light weight and comfortable.

These are definitely a thinner material so further into season I probably won’t be about to wear. The sizing was pretty accurate, a little tight in the waist but the rest was sized and fit great. We’ll see with some more wear how the quality is after washing multiple times but first wash was ok, no shrinking or anything.
One of the elastics broke the first time I put them on. Clearly not good quality. I will be returning
